row.scheme:
;;;tuplet Brackets toggle (let ((current "")) (set! current (d-DirectiveGet-standalone-postfix "ToggleTupletBrackets")) (if (boolean? current) (begin (d-DirectivePut-standalone-minpixels "ToggleTupletBrackets" 20) (d-MoveCursorLeft) (set! current "\\override TupletBracket #'bracket-visibility = ##f") (d-DirectivePut-standalone-postfix "ToggleTupletBrackets" "\\override TupletBracket #'bracket-visibility = ##f") ))
(if (equal? current "\\override TupletBracket #'bracket-visibility = ##t ") (begin (d-DirectivePut-standalone-postfix "ToggleTupletBrackets" "\\override TupletBracket #'bracket-visibility = ##f ") (d-DirectivePut-standalone-graphic "ToggleTupletBrackets" "StartTupletBrackets")) (begin (d-DirectivePut-standalone-postfix "ToggleTupletBrackets" "\\override TupletBracket #'bracket-visibility = ##t ") (d-DirectivePut-standalone-graphic "ToggleTupletBrackets" "StopTupletBrackets"))) ;; (d-MoveCursorRight) (d-RefreshDisplay))
row._tooltip: Turns tuplet brackets off or on.
